channel.title: What do you look for in PKing?
channel.description:
Just wondering... What do you guys look for when you want to PK on a server... What I currently have: 1. Fast switching 2. Clipping 3. Better combat then the default PI combat
Those are some things that I have off the top of my head... Please shoot some more my way!

item.title: What do you look for in PKing?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:22, topic:451323”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=554214.msg4060151#msg4060151 date=1343343484]

I can agree with the prodding thing. In so many servers, I always get attacked instantly by the rich bastards with 100 sets of statius and chaotic mauls who think they’re “pro pkers” because they get lucky hits.

The hits aren’t lucky, its the general fact that in most servers those items are overpowered

The hits are practically based on the outcome of a slot machine, you have nothing but luck. And yes, items and combat systems are typically overpowered.
[/quote]

Not exactly, prayers and attack boosting things like potions have an effect on how often you hit.[/quote]
Of course they do, however that doesn’t mean a person in rune can’t beat a person in torva, it just means that it’s less likely for the guy in torva will get hit. Boosts basically just make it so you have more chances to hit, but it’s still almost completely random on whether you hit or not.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in PKing?

item.title: What do you look for in PKing?
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:17, topic:451323”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=554214.msg4059902#msg4059902 date=1343332658]
where you can pk in one hand and train babymaking in the other <3

but no seriously.

I like a pking server that has realistic hits, a unique combat triangle. Such as perhaps you get metal armor similar to the behemoth in dungeoneering.
[/quote]I have a combat system approved by AtomicInt_

[quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=554214.msg4059970#msg4059970 date=1343335318]
Noobs I can kill.

Anndd I also look for servers that if they have those overpowered items, nobody can get them in a day, maybe if it took like a week or two to even get one, that’d be fine.
[/quote]I’m planning on having it a challenging way to get. One thing is that forcenthy dungeon thingy (I’m not sure if that’s right or not) that’s a PK area, so that way it’s going to be harder to get PvP Armors. Also for Chaotics, I’m not sure if I’m just going to have them for donations, or if I’m going to add dungeoneering. Donations would be good, cause only certain people would want to donate, so that would sieve out 1000’s of people having it, but Dungeoneering would be a more unique way of doing things and more fun. Would be harder to get of course :P[/quote]
Yeah, it’s the forinthry dungeon (I think?). Also, I think donating for chaotics is a good idea. All of them are very powerful, and it would be a good perk for donating.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in PKing?

Would be harder to get of course

item.title: What do you look for in PKing?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Pink Phat, post:6, topic:451323”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=554214.msg4059227#msg4059227 date=1343271428]

  1. Correct switching
  2. Clipping
  3. Correct formulas for items, nothing’s over powered.
  4. PKP shop is reasonable
  5. Nothing is severally prodded.

[/quote]What do you mean when you say “severally prodded”? And get on MSN, I’ll show ya the combat I’m using…

Prodding would mean only using highly powered items. C maul, ags, for example.[/quote]OK. So basically what your saying is to regulate the flow of OP’d items…

@AtomicInt_ post
There won’t be any Mutli Combat in level 1 wildy, so that’s not a problem… The wildy ditch is there, so there’s a gap between the time you cross the ditch and you hit PvP area, so IDK if that’s going to help or not…

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in PKing?

item.title: What do you look for in PKing?
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:

[quote=“runewings317, post:3, topic:451323”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=554214.msg4059225#msg4059225 date=1343271298]

  1. Correct switching
  2. Clipping
  3. Correct formulas for items, nothing’s over powered.
  4. PKP shop is reasonable
  5. Nothing is severally prodded.

[/quote]What do you mean when you say “severally prodded”? And get on MSN, I’ll show ya the combat I’m using…[/quote]
Prodding would mean only using highly powered items. C maul, ags, for example.
